name: Space Thief
description:
• Press spacebar to jump
  • Collect orange gems to increase score
  • Collect eggs to fill up progress bar
  • Press Q after collecting 5 eggs to push the enemy back
  • Collect 100 gems to win the game

Assets Used:

https://kayillustrations.itch.io/parallax-terrestrial-planet https://limezu.itch.io/animated-mini-characters-3-platform-free https://limezu.itch.io/animated-mini-characters https://adwitr.itch.io/pixel-health-bar-asset-pack-2                                                                        https://kronbits.itch.io/particle-pack
